action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Voluntary Protection Program Act
This bill directs the Department of Labor to establish a program that encourages the establishment of comprehensive safety and health management systems to protect employees from occupational hazards. Labor must also establish a voluntary protection program that encourages excellence and recognizes its achievement in both the technical and managerial protection of employees from occupational hazards.
